page.title: 02Farming in the Community.
page.content: The farmers enjoy attending the auction markets at Gisburn, Clitheroe, Preston and Lancaster. The farmers and the general public live alongside each other quite well, but problems do occur with broken fencing and walls,litter,dogs worrying farm animals and poaching. The farmers' main difficulties in 1985 have been a very wet summer and their quota of milk allowed by the E.E.C. being decreased. Farming is an important area of life around Mellor. Soon it is our Harvest Festival in church when the farmers, villagers,school children and clergy all join together in a thanksgiving service.
